articles.title: Rani Mukerji, Aamir Khan seen together in rare picture shared by Ira | Onmanorama - Onmanorama
articles.description: Aamir and Rani have remained good friends and shared amazing chemistry in films like Ghulam, Mangal Pandey: The Rising, among others.
articles.content: Rani Mukerji who has acted in multiple projects along with Aamir Khan met her co-star and his daughter Ira Khan at their residence in Mumbai recently. A photo of Rani, Aamir and Ira Khan posing toget… [+1011 chars]
